en: I have no intention of lending this watch to anyone, much less parting with it.

en: I took over the business from Father.
I work for a trading company.
I am weak as regards to girls.
I'll be happy whether I win or lose.

ko: 비록 여자지만, 어떤 사회적 불의에도 맞서 싸울 거예요.

en: I heard a woman scream.

ko: 여자가 남자보다 꼭 더 도덕적이라는 생각엔 절대 동의하지 않아요.

en: I remember I saw the queen.
I remember meeting the queen.

I intend seeing the queen.

ko: 전 어떤 여자와도 사랑에 빠져본 적이 없어요.

en: I've never fallen in love with any girl.
ko: 전 한 번도 어떤 여자와 사랑에 빠져본 적 없어요.

en: I've never fallen in love with a girl.
ko: 전 여자랑 사랑에 빠져본 적이 없어요.

en: I saw the girls pick the wild flowers.
I like lyric better than epic.

I don't have any friends to help me.

I don't know every one of you.

en: I've deposited the papers with him.

I couldn't sleep because of the heat.

I can't stand the heat.

ko: 처음엔 그 사람 말을 믿을 수 없었어요.

en: At first I did not like him, but now I do.

en: I ate Japanese food for the first time.

en: I put up with her as long as I could.

en: I have finished my assignment.

en: I was unable to finish my homework.

en: I've finished my homework.

en: I have no time to do my homework.

en: I have just been to the station to see my uncle off.

en: I am living with my uncle.

en: I was given a camera by my uncle.

en: I hadn't seen for ten years.

en: I am going to spend the weekend in Kanazawa.

en: I like spring better than fall.

en: I put the receiver to my ear.

I shook my head.

en: The spirits muddled my brain.

en: To make sure that I said all the right things in the letter.

en: I led him by the hand.

en: I am a housewife.

en: I don't agree to a young lady going there alone.
